title: Not sure if this is a bug
body:
Not sure if this is a bug but every time I go to patch my client to 5.2 it gets to 285 files everytime then my whole computer crashes
I tested other games and none of them caused this problem, only league

replies.body:
>then my whole computer crashes

That seems like a bug. Your whole computer crashes because of the patcher? Are you sure about this? Like, how could that even happen? Is your patcher having memory leaks?
